opportunities.title: Coastal Marine Scientist — Graduate/Early Career
opportunities.description: A global environmental consultancy is seeking a Graduate Coastal Engineer or Marine Scientist to join their Oceans and Environmental team. This position involves working on marine environmental projects including offshore renewable energy developments and environmental risk assessments. Ideal candidates will have a relevant degree and be eager to develop their skills in a collaborative environment. Opportunities for training and professional development are provided.

opportunities.title: Principal Marine Scientist
opportunities.description:
Join to apply for the Principal Marine Scientist role at Epic Environmental.

We at Epic Environmental treat our people as our biggest asset, we invest in professional development, we understand that a healthy work/life balance is important and that a supportive, collaborative and dynamic culture is key.

Backed by Montrose Environmental, a NYSE listed world leader in environmental solutions, Epic is passionate about delivering innovative solutions for our clients and the planet.

opportunities.title: Principal Marine Scientist - Hybrid Water Quality Leader
opportunities.description:
A leading environmental consulting firm in the United States is looking for a Principal Marine Scientist to leverage expertise in marine and aquatic environments. The role involves mentoring a water services team, managing projects, and working on high-impact projects with diverse clients. This mid-senior level position offers a competitive salary, remote work options, and a collaborative culture.

opportunities.title: On Call Early Career Marine Biologist
opportunities.description:
Job Description

This Opportunity

This role supports the delivery of marine biology investigations and environmental studies by applying foundational knowledge of biological, ecological, and oceanographic principles to real-world aquatic environments. It contributes to projects focused on the monitoring, conservation, and restoration of marine species and habitats, ensuring compliance with environmental regulations and data quality standards. This Opportunity

This role leads the delivery of complex marine biology projects by integrating deep technical expertise with a strategic understanding of marine ecosystems and regulatory environments. It provides advanced scientific input for environmental assessments, monitoring programs, and restoration initiatives, while also guiding the work of project teams to ensure technical excellence and consistency across deliverables.
